analysis.description: HTLC.redeem (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#509-522) allows anyone to destruct the contract

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#351-366) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#363-364)

VCBCrowdSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#588-596) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#589)

VCBCrowdSale.giftTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#596-611) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,gifttokens) (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol#607-610)

VCBCrowdSale.preserveTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(preservecontract,amount) (/unique_chucks/47/0x27555d7292f22a65e24d7a45b17faa970a2cb20d.sol)
